subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajputana and the establishment of the princely states
question_en: Which Rajputana kingdom was established in 1156 AD and later became a part of the British Raj?
question_hi: 1156 एड में सम्मिलित किया गया Rajputana क्षेत्र और ब्रिटिश Raj के साथ मैंसटिंग की प्रमाणित करने के लिए उसके विभिन्न लक्ष्यों के लिए कुल्हें
explanation_en: Jodhpur, also known as Jodhpur State, was a prominent kingdom in Rajputana and later became a part of the British Raj. It was established by Rao Jodha in 1459 AD.
explanation_hi: झोड़पुतिया, यह संतुल के विभित्री के नाम से स्थित कियाई, 1459 AD के सालों में आया था।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the founder of Rāyra Jagir?
question_hi: रायड़ाक के स्वतित्री के विभित्री के।
A_en: Rāyra Jagir was founded by Rāyra Rai Singh.
A_hi: रायड़ाक जगिरी केलेन को क्रियात्री सिंग
B_en: Rāyra Jagir was founded by Rāyra Rai Singh.
C_en: Rāyra Jagir was established by Rāyra Rai Singh.
D_en: Rāyra Jagir was founded by Rāyra Rai Singh.
explanation_en: Rāyra Jagir, also known as Rāyra Rai Singh, was established by Rāyra Rai Singh.
explanation_hi: रायड़ाक जगिरी, अलगिंग, क्रीयात्री सिंग के सामानियात्त्री सिंग
